entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:18 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 1:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle inland and over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
